summary.span: 定義控制項的基底類別，它們屬於具視覺表示的元件。

span.span: Defines the base class for controls, which are components with visual representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立您自己的控制項類別，繼承自，類別，或從其他的 Windows Form 提供的控制項。To create your own control class, inherit from the , classes, or from the other Windows Forms provided controls. 如需有關如何撰寫自訂控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 開發自訂 Windows Form 控制項和.NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md). 類別會實作非常基本的功能所需的資訊顯示給使用者的類別。The class implements very basic functionality required by classes that display information to the user. 它會處理透過鍵盤和指標裝置的使用者輸入。It handles user input through the keyboard and pointing devices. 它會處理訊息路由和安全性。It handles message routing and security. 雖然它不會實作繪製，它會定義控制項 （其位置和大小） 的界限。It defines the bounds of a control (its position and size), although it does not implement painting. 它提供的視窗控制代碼 (`hWnd`)。It provides a window handle (`hWnd`). Windows Form 控制項使用的環境屬性，因此子控制項可以類似於其周圍的環境。Windows Forms controls use ambient properties so child controls can appear like their surrounding environment. *環境屬性*是控制項的屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An *ambient property* is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 如果控制項沒有，而且未設定這個屬性，控制會嘗試判斷透過環境屬性的值屬性。If the control does not have a , and the property is not set, the control attempts to determine the value of the ambient property through the property. 如果未設置控制項，如果網站不支援環境的屬性，或在未設定屬性，控制項會使用它自己的預設值。If the control is not sited, if the site does not support ambient properties, or if the property is not set on the , the control uses its own default values. 一般而言，環境屬性代表特性的控制項，例如，也就是傳送到子控制項。Typically, an ambient property represents a characteristic of a control, such as , that is communicated to a child control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 所提供的環境屬性類別包括： ， ， ， ，和。Ambient properties provided by the class include: , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 若要讓支援視覺化樣式的 Windows Forms 應用程式，請務必設定屬性設`System`並包含可執行檔的資訊清單。To make your Windows Forms application support visual styles, be sure to set the property to `System` and include a manifest with your executable. 資訊清單是 XML 檔案中所包含的應用程式可執行檔中的資源或做為個別的檔案位於與可執行檔相同的目錄。A manifest is an XML file that is included either as a resource within your application executable or as a separate file that resides in the same directory as the executable file. 如需範例資訊清單中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的列舉型別。For an example of a manifest, see the Example section of the enumeration. 如需使用視覺化樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx)。For more information about using visual styles, see [Visual Styles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx). Windows Form 有內建的協助工具支援，並提供可讓它使用協助工具用戶端應用程式，例如畫面加大工具和檢閱者公用程式時，螢幕小鍵盤，語音輸入的公用程式，您的應用程式的相關資訊替代輸入的裝置，以及鍵盤加強公用程式。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications such as screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 有時候，您要提供協助工具用戶端應用程式的其他資訊。Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications. 有兩種方式可以提供這項額外資訊。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 您可以設定， ， ，和將協助工具用戶端應用程式報告的屬性值。You can set the , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 這個方法通常用於提供現有控制項的有限的協助工具資訊。This method is typically used to provide limited accessibility information for existing controls. 或者，您可以在其中撰寫您自己的類別衍生自或提供協助工具資訊所需的類別。Alternatively, you can write your own class deriving from the or classes, providing as much accessibility information as needed. > [!NOTE] > 若要維持較佳的效能，請勿在其建構函式中設定控制項的大小。To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor. 慣用的方法是覆寫屬性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 不加入資料繫結其建構函式中。Do not add data bindings for a in its constructor. 這樣會導致程式碼產生錯誤，而且可能會導致不想要的行為。Doing so will cause errors in code generation and can cause unwanted behavior. 中的控制項大多命名空間使用基礎的 Windows 通用控制項做為基底為基礎。The majority of the controls in the namespace use the underlying Windows common control as a base to build on. 如需有關 Windows 通用控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[一般控制項參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx)。For more information about the Windows common controls, see [General Control Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx). 若要識別 Windows Forms 控制項，從不同的處理序，使用標準`SendMessage`傳遞 WM_GETCONTROLNAME 訊息的呼叫。To identify Windows Forms controls from a separate process, use a standard `SendMessage` call to pass the WM_GETCONTROLNAME message. WM_GETCONTROLNAME 無關的語言和 Windows 的階層。WM_GETCONTROLNAME is independent of the language and Windows hierarchy. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 建議解決方案 for Windows Forms 」 主題[自動化 Windows Form](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx)。For more information, see the "Recommended Solution for Windows Forms" topic in[Automating Windows Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx). 使用來同步處理從多個執行緒存取控制項的屬性。Use the property to synchronize access to the control from multiple threads. 如需有關多執行緒的 Windows Form 控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:Windows Form 控制項的安全執行緒呼叫](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)

threadsafe.span: 只有下列成員都是安全執行緒： ， ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。

span.span: Only the following members are thread safe: , , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created.

threadsafe.span: 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。

span.span: Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用的所有控制項的基底類別。The class is the base class for all controls used in a Windows Forms application. 由於通常不會使用這個類別建立類別的執行個體，這個建構函式通常不會直接呼叫，但而由衍生類別呼叫。Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class. 本版建構函式設定初始屬性值，以`text`參數值。This version of the constructor sets the initial property value to the `text` parameter value. 初始並的控制項由決定`left`， `top`，`width`和`height`參數值。The initial and of the control are determined by the `left`, `top`, `width` and `height` parameter values. > [!NOTE] > 若要維持較佳的效能，請勿在其建構函式中設定控制項的大小。To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor. 慣用的方法是覆寫屬性。The preferred method is to override the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用的所有控制項的基底類別。The class is the base class for all controls used in a Windows Forms application. 由於通常不會使用這個類別建立類別的執行個體，這個建構函式通常不會直接呼叫，但而由衍生類別呼叫。Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class. 本版建構函式設定初始屬性值，以`text`參數值。This version of the constructor sets the initial property value to the `text` parameter value. 建構函式也會將控制項加入至父控制項的。The constructor also adds the control to the parent control's . 初始並的控制項由決定`left`， `top`，`width`和`height`參數值。The initial and of the control are determined by the `left`, `top`, `width` and `height` parameter values. > [!NOTE] > 若要維持較佳的效能，請勿在其建構函式中設定控制項的大小。To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor. 慣用的方法是覆寫屬性。The preferred method is to override the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須呼叫方法，每個協助工具用戶端應用程式所收到的通知。You must call the method for each the accessibility client applications are to be notified of. 設定，或從屬性時，通常會呼叫方法的事件處理常式。The method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler. 例如，您可能會呼叫方法並傳入的值`Hide`從內的事件處理常式事件。For example, you might call the method and pass in an value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製它不會由圖表控制項中，沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼的摘錄示範如何呼叫方法。This code excerpt demonstrates calling the method. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的屬性會描述使用者的觀點來操作物件的主要方法。An object's property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint. 這個屬性應該是動詞或動詞簡短片語。This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的物件有預設動作，且有些物件可能會有相關的預設動作其屬性，如下列範例所示：Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: - 選取的核取方塊具有 「 取消核取 」 的預設動作和值的 「 檢查 」。A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked." - 已清除的核取方塊具有 「 檢查 」 的預設動作，值是 「 未核取 」。A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked." - 標記為 「 列印 」 的按鈕有預設動作是 「 按下 「 沒有值。A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value. - 標籤或文字方塊控制項，顯示"Printer"沒有預設動作，不過會有值為"Printer"。A label or a text box control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer." 如需可存取物件的屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[內容的描述性屬性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的屬性會提供有關物件的視覺外觀的文字描述。An object's property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance. 描述主要用來針對視障或眼盲的使用者，提供更高的內容，但也可用於搜尋內容或其他應用程式。The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications. 屬性為描述並不明顯，如果需要或如果它是多餘以基礎物件的， ， ，和屬性。The property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties. 比方說，具有 [確定] 按鈕就不需要額外的資訊，但是顯示圖片的仙人掌的按鈕。For example, a button with "OK" would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would. ，並(也可能) 仙人掌按鈕屬性會描述其用途，但屬性會傳達資訊是無形的例如 「 顯示仙人掌圖片的按鈕 」。The , and (and perhaps ) properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus." 如需可存取物件的屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[內容的描述性屬性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體衍生類別， `MyCheckBox`，將它指派到其屬性和集合並屬性，因為屬性是`null`。The following code example creates an instance of a derived class, `MyCheckBox`, assigns it an to its property and sets the and properties, because the property is `null`. 此範例中，您需要名為`MyForm`。This example requires that you have a named `MyForm`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CPP/controlaccessibility.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CS/controlaccessibility.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/VB/controlaccessibility.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用卸除使用者映像或映像檔拖曳至表單，並讓它顯示在其上的點。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製的映像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會保留直到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法會決定所拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為並的值為螢幕座標，此範例會使用將它們轉換成工作區座標中的方法。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項繫結至的容器邊緣，並決定控制項隨其父代重新調整大小的方式。

value.span: 值的位元組合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 和 。

span.span: The default is and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義控制項自動調整大小的方式其父控制項調整大小時。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 錨定在其父控制項的控制項，可確保父控制項調整大小時，錨定的邊緣保持在父控制項邊緣的相對的相同位置。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. 您可以錨定在其容器的一或多個邊緣的控制項。You can anchor a control to one or more edges of its container. 比方說，如果您有與其屬性值設定為`Top`並`Bottom`，則縮放以維護頂端和底部邊緣錨定的距離作為的會增加。For example, if you have a with a whose property value is set to `Top` and `Bottom`, the is stretched to maintain the anchored distance to the top and bottom edges of the as the of the is increased. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次和最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 它會設定下一步調整大小的按鈕，以相同的大小和。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定要`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會新增事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此範例中，您需要名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不支援透明的色彩，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`的值設定為`true`。The property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of is set to `true`. 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需有關環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定和為預設系統色彩的控制項。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控制項具有任何子控制項，程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫它本身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此程式碼範例，您需要與至少一個子控制項; 不過，子容器控制項，例如或，使用自己的子控制項會更適當展現遞迴。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件屬性會變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數個方法名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應的屬性名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更要如果數字為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此範例中，您需要，其中包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . remarks.format: ## Remarks - 使用將圖片拖曳至控制項的屬性。Use the property to place a graphic image onto a control. > [!NOTE] > Windows Form 控制項不支援映像，包含半透明或安全性透明的色彩做為背景影像。Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images. > > 這個屬性不支援子控制項屬性是`true`。This property is not supported on child controls whose property is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 它會設定下一步調整大小的按鈕，以相同的大小和。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定要`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會新增事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此範例中，您需要名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: A delegate to a method that takes no parameters.

summary.span: 在建立控制項基礎控制代碼的執行緒上執行指定的非同步委派。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.

returns.span: ，表示 作業的結果。

span.span: An that represents the result of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以非同步方式呼叫的委派，這個方法會立即傳回。The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately. 您可以從任何執行緒，即使是在擁有控制項的控制代碼的執行緒呼叫這個方法。You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle. 如果尚不存在的控制項控點，直到它找到的控制項或表單沒有視窗控制代碼，這個方法會搜尋控制項的父鏈結。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何適當的控制代碼，將會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, will throw an exception. 委派方法中的例外狀況視為未截獲，將會傳送至應用程式的設陷例外狀況處理常式。Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler. 您可以呼叫來委派，從擷取的傳回值，如果建立，但這並非必要。You can call to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required. 將會封鎖直到可以擷取傳回的值。 will block until the return value can be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 在控制項上的大部分方法可以只從呼叫的執行緒建立控制項。Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created. 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 所有其他的方法呼叫中，您應該使用其中一種叫用方法來對控制項的執行緒的呼叫封送處理。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 叫用方法一律會叫用其控制項的執行緒上回呼。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為使用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. [!code-cpp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CPP/control_begininvoke.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CS/control_begininvoke.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/VB/control_begininvoke.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以非同步方式呼叫的委派，這個方法會立即傳回。The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately. 您可以從任何執行緒，即使是在擁有控制項的控制代碼的執行緒呼叫這個方法。You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle. 如果尚不存在的控制項控點，直到它找到的控制項或表單沒有視窗控制代碼，這個方法會搜尋控制項的父鏈結。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何適當的控制代碼，將會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, will throw an exception. 委派方法中的例外狀況視為未截獲，將會傳送至應用程式的設陷例外狀況處理常式。Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler. 您可以呼叫來委派，從擷取的傳回值，如果建立，但這並非必要。You can call to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required. 將會封鎖直到可以擷取傳回的值。 will block until the return value can be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 在控制項上的大部分方法可以只從呼叫的執行緒建立控制項。Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created. 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 所有其他的方法呼叫中，您應該使用其中一種叫用方法來對控制項的執行緒的呼叫封送處理。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 叫用方法一律會叫用其控制項的執行緒上回呼。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為使用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否捕捉住滑鼠。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has captured the mouse.

value.span: 如果控制項捕捉住滑鼠，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control has captured the mouse; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項已捕捉滑鼠時，資料指標位於其框線會收到滑鼠輸入。When a control has captured the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 通常只有在拖曳作業時才會捕捉滑鼠。The mouse is typically only captured during drag operations. 前景視窗可以捕捉滑鼠。Only the foreground window can capture the mouse. 當背景視窗嘗試這麼做時，視窗會收到僅適用於滑鼠游標位於視窗的可見部分時，會發生的滑鼠事件的訊息。When a background window attempts to do so, the window receives messages only for mouse events that occur when the mouse cursor is within the visible portion of the window. 此外，即使前景視窗已捕捉滑鼠，使用者仍然可以按一下另一個視窗中，將其帶至前景。Also, even if the foreground window has captured the mouse, the user can still click another window, bringing it to the foreground. 捕捉到滑鼠之後，快速鍵不應該有作用。When the mouse is captured, shortcut keys should not work. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 若要在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼label1 和兩個名為listbox1 和 listbox2，名為控制項。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named label1 and two controls named listbox1 and listbox2. 請確定表單和控制項的事件是在此範例中方法相關聯。Ensure the form and controls' event is associated with the method in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式正在偵錯時，是否要攔截不該存取卻存取控制項 屬性之錯誤執行緒上的呼叫。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to catch calls on the wrong thread that access a control's property when an application is being debugged.

value.span: 如果會攔截錯誤執行緒上的呼叫，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if calls on the wrong thread are caught; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項的建立的執行緒以外的執行緒嘗試存取該控制項的方法或屬性的其中一個時，它通常會導致無法預期的結果。When a thread other than the creating thread of a control tries to access one of that control's methods or properties, it often leads to unpredictable results. 常見的無效的執行緒活動是存取控制項之錯誤執行緒上的呼叫屬性。A common invalid thread activity is a call on the wrong thread that accesses the control's property. 設定至`true`即可尋找並偵錯時，更輕鬆地診斷此執行緒的活動。Set to `true` to find and diagnose this thread activity more easily while debugging.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件會傳遞至其事件處理常式，因此它只表示按一下已發生。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果您需要更特定的滑鼠資訊 （按鈕按一下、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 不過，如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，不會引發事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間應間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式並事件，則和按兩下表單時，並會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下控制項時，控制項不支援事件，事件可能會引發兩次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 您必須設定`StandardClick`的值到`true`引發此事件。You must set the `StandardClick` value of to `true` for this event to be raised. > [!NOTE] > 下列事件不會引發類別，除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動 索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是 索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## 繼承者注意事項Notes to inheritors 繼承自標準的 Windows Form 控制項，並變更`StandardClick`或`StandardDoubleClick`的值要`true`可以會造成非預期的行為，或完全沒有任何作用，如果控制項不支援或事件。Inheriting from a standard Windows Forms control and changing the `StandardClick` or `StandardDoubleClick` values of to `true` can cause unexpected behavior or have no effect at all if the control does not support the or events. 下表列出 Windows Form 控制項和事件 (或) 會引發以回應指定的滑鼠動作。The following table lists Windows Forms controls and which event ( or ) is raised in response to the mouse action specified. | 控制項Control | remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的用戶端區域是減去的非工作項目，例如捲軸列、 框線、 標題列和功能表的控制項的界限。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 因為工作區座標是相對於控制項的用戶端區域左上角，這個屬性所傳回的矩形的左上角的座標為 (0，0)。Because client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the client area of the control, the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle returned by this property are (0,0). 您可以使用這個屬性，若要取得的大小和工作，例如控制項的介面上繪製的控制項的用戶端區域的座標。You can use this property to obtain the size and coordinates of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 在控制項上繪製的相關資訊，請參閱[呈現 Windows Forms 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用自動捲動的表單、 調整表單，並確保按鈕保持可見的表單的大小時之後。The following code example enables auto-scrolling for a form, resizes the form, and ensures that a button remains visible after the form is resized. 此範例中，您需要具有名為`button2`在其上。This example requires that you have a with a named `button2` on it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的用戶端區域是減去的非工作項目，例如捲軸列、 框線、 標題列和功能表的控制項的界限。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 方法呼叫以設定屬性。The method is called to set the property. 屬性永遠不會變更透過其`set`方法，因此您應該覆寫方法，以確保您的程式碼會在執行時屬性設定。The property is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the method to ensure that your code is executed when the property is set. 和屬性代表控制項的用戶端區域的高度與寬度。The and properties represent the width and height of the client area of the control. 若要取得之控制項的工作，例如繪製控制項的介面上的工作區的大小，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to obtain the size of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 在控制項上繪製的相關資訊，請參閱[呈現 Windows Forms 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 您無法將應用程式設定繫結至這個屬性。You cannot bind application settings to this property. 如需有關應用程式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 應用程式設定概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md)。For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整大小指定的控制項，讓控制項可以容納它的格式化的文字。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 格式化的文字與控制項的屬性指派套用至文字。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. `AutoSizeControl`方法，在此範例中也有`textPadding`參數，表示要套用至控制項所有邊緣的填補量。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要讓出現相同的填補，以將文字的對齊值，如果您的控制項支援它。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the value, if your control supports it. remarks.format: ## Remarks A可做為控制項的集合的父系。A can act as a parent to a collection of controls. 例如，當數個控制項加入至，每個控制項是隸屬指派給表單，衍生自屬性類別。For example, when several controls are added to a , each of the controls is a member of the assigned to the property of the form, which is derived from the class. 您可以使用操作中的控制項指派給屬性中提供的方法，利用類別。You can manipulate the controls in the assigned to the property by using the methods available in the class. 將數個控制項加入至父控制項中，建議您呼叫方法之前初始化要加入的控制項。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 之後將控制項加入至父控制項，呼叫方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 這樣會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。Doing so will increase the performance of applications with many controls. 使用來逐一查看所有控制項的表單，包括巢狀的控制項的屬性。Use the property to iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls. 使用方法來擷取上一個或下一步 的子控制項的定位順序。Use the method to retrieve the previous or next child control in the tab order. 使用屬性來取得或設定容器控制項的作用中的控制項。Use the property to get or set the active control of a container control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例中移除從衍生類別的如果它是集合的成員。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 這個範例需要您已建立，則，和至少一個控制。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one control on a . 控制項新增至控制項，而加入至控制項。The control(s) are added to the control, and the control added to the . 按一下按鈕時，名為選項按鈕`removeButton`移除從。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `removeButton` is removed from the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有明確呼叫 方法，將會在參考 屬性時呼叫該方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 取得或設定屬性，您必須加入的參考`Accessibility`以安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製它不會由圖表控制項中，沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄會示範如何覆寫方法。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the method. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件，擷取透過方法應該不通常會保留之後處理完目前的 Windows 訊息，因為與該物件所繪製的任何項目將會清除與 [下一步] WM_PAINT 訊息。The object that you retrieve through the method should not normally be retained after the current Windows message has been processed, because anything painted with that object will be erased with the next WM_PAINT message. 因此您無法快取物件，供重複使用，但若要使用非視覺方法，例如。Therefore you cannot cache the object for reuse, except to use non-visual methods like . 相反地，您必須呼叫您想要使用的每次物件，然後再呼叫當您完成使用它。Instead, you must call every time that you want to use the object, and then call when you are finished using it. 如需有關 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about Windows messages, see . 根據設計，進行呼叫的執行緒，設定擁有權，並在其他執行緒上呼叫，就會失敗。By design, sets ownership to the calling thread, and fails if it is called on other threads. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 所有其他的方法呼叫中，您應該使用其中一種叫用方法來對控制項的執行緒的呼叫封送處理。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整大小指定的控制項，讓控制項可以容納它的格式化的文字。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 格式化的文字與控制項的屬性指派套用至文字。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. `AutoSizeControl`方法，在此範例中也有`textPadding`參數，表示要套用至控制項所有邊緣的填補量。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要讓出現相同的填補，以將文字的對齊`MiddleCenter`的值如果控制項支援它。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the `MiddleCenter` value of if your control supports it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派至將滑鼠指標位於控制項上方時顯示的游標變更控制項的屬性。Assign a to the property of the control to change the cursor displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control. 若要暫時變更您的應用程式集上的所有控制項的滑鼠游標屬性。To temporarily change the mouse cursor for all controls on your application set the property. 通常您會設定等候資料指標時填入屬性或儲存或載入檔案。Typically you would set the property to a wait cursor when populating a or saving or loading a file. 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需有關環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入含有使用者的可用邏輯磁碟機。The following code example fills a with the user's available logical drives. 此範例也會設定下拉式方塊屬性因此下拉式按鈕上方有滑鼠指標時，會顯示資料指標。The example also sets the combo box's property so the cursor is displayed when the mouse pointer is over the drop-down button. 此程式碼，您必須擁有與在其上。This code requires that you have a with a on it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述傳回的值視作業系統和當地文化特性而定。The following table describes the value returned by depending on the operating system and local culture. |系統 / 和或文化特性System/and or Culture|字型Font| |----------------------------|----------| |Windows NT 4 x，日文版Windows NT 4x, Japanese version|MS UI 哥，9 點。MS UI Gothic, 9 point.| |阿拉伯文 WindowsArabic Windows|新細明體，8 點。Tahoma, 8 point.| |其他作業系統/文化特性Other operating system/culture|MS Shell Dlg 邏輯字型，通常是 Microsoft San Serif 8 點。MS Shell Dlg logical font, typically Microsoft San Serif 8 point.| MS Shell Dlg 會對應至系統登錄中設定的字型。MS Shell Dlg maps to a font set in the system registry. 如果尚未安裝先前的字型的預設字型是新細明體，8 點。If the previous fonts are not installed, the default font is Tahoma, 8 point. 如果未安裝新細明體，8 點，傳回的值屬性If Tahoma, 8 point, is not installed, returns the value of the property ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，和成員。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含呼叫 ListBox1。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a called ListBox1. 呼叫`Populate_ListBox`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。Call the `Populate_ListBox` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回控制項的顯示區域的用戶端矩形。The property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control. 基底控制項類別，這個值等於用戶端矩形項目。For the base control class, this is equal to the client rectangle. 不過，繼承的控制項可能會想要變更這，如果其工作區不同於其顯示區域。However, inheriting controls might want to change this if their client area differs from their display area. 顯示矩形是最小封入控制項，用來配置控制項。The display rectangle is the smallest that encloses a control and is used to lay out controls.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。`Dispose()`This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method.`Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性會傳回`true`，基底類別正在處置。When this property returns `true`, the base class is in the process of disposing. 已處置控制項之後，不會再做為有效的 Windows 控制項參考它。After the control is disposed of, it can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使控制項的執行個體已經處置，它仍然會保留在記憶體中移除從透過記憶體回收的記憶體之前。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 當控制項已經處置時，無法呼叫其方法。When a control is disposed of, you cannot call its method.

summary.span: 取得或設定停駐在其父控制項的控制項框線，並決定控制項隨其父代重新調整大小的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義控制項自動調整大小的方式其父控制項調整大小時。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，設定至會讓控制項對齊其父控制項的左邊緣與，並調整大小的父控制項調整大小時。For example, setting to causes the control to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控制項停駐在其的疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 以及在表單上控制項的視覺分層。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控制項可以固定到其父容器的一個邊緣或所有邊緣可以停都駐並填滿父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 設定停駐的控制項上的屬性沒有任何影響的控制項與其容器邊緣的距離。Setting the property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the edges of its container. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次和最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此範例會建立，並設定其群組方塊內。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下來，它會設定屬性群組 方塊中，並群組方塊的停駐在表單頂端。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最後，它會停用 [群組] 中設定屬性設`false`，因而導致停用群組內包含的所有控制項。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

span.span: A value from the enumeration that represents the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `allowedEffects`參數會決定哪些作業可以發生的拖曳。The `allowedEffects` parameter determines which drag operations can occur. 如果與另一個處理序中的應用程式交互操作，需要在拖曳作業，資料應該是基底的 managed 的類別 (， ，或)，或該物件會實作或。If the drag operation needs to interoperate with applications in another process, data should either be a base managed class (, , or ), or an object that implements or . 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 它接著會檢查控制項為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項是有效的置放目標、與指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更，就會引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業為基礎的值事件的屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果的值是`Continue`，則就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回饋。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此當滑鼠移動經過置放目標，則使用者可以最新的回應滑鼠的位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，讓來源應用程式可以執行適當作業，資料來源; 例如，剪下資料如果作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值已`Cancel`，則就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 方法會攔截所有例外狀況，並重新擲回，只有下列安全性或重大例外狀況：The method catches all exceptions and rethrows only the following security or critical exceptions: - SecurityExceptionSecurityException - NullReferenceExceptionNullReferenceException - StackOverflowExceptionStackOverflowException - OutOfMemoryExceptionOutOfMemoryException - ThreadAbortExceptionThreadAbortException - ExecutionEngineExceptionExecutionEngineException - IndexOutOfRangeExceptionIndexOutOfRangeException - AccessViolationExceptionAccessViolationException ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 按鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設為`None`在。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel` . 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉，來指定如何傳送的資料之間的拖放作業中的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the enumeration to specify how data should be transferred between the controls involved in a drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要您的表單，包含控制項和控制以及控制項填入有效的檔案名稱的清單。This example requires that your form includes a control and a control and that the control is populated with a list of valid file names. 當使用者拖曳到檔名控制項、 控制項就會引發事件。When the user drags a file name onto the control, the control's event is raised. 事件處理常式內的屬性初始化為表示的檔案路徑所參考的資料都應該複製到控制項。Within the event handler, the property of the is initialized to to indicate that the data referenced by the file path should be copied to the control. [!code-cpp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個控制項是否應使用次要緩衝區重繪其介面，以減少或防止重繪閃動 (Flicker)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.

value.span: 如果應該使用雙重緩衝繪製控制項的介面，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已緩衝的圖形可以減少或消除閃爍顯示介面的組件的漸進式重繪作業所導致。Buffered graphics can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by progressive redrawing of parts of a displayed surface. 緩衝的圖形時，需要更新的圖形資料先寫入的緩衝區。Buffered graphics require that the updated graphics data is first written to a buffer. 圖形緩衝區中的資料會再快速寫入顯示介面的記憶體。The data in the graphics buffer is then quickly written to displayed surface memory. 顯示的圖形記憶體的相對快速的交換器通常可減少閃爍，否則可能會發生。The relatively quick switch of the displayed graphics memory typically reduces the flicker that can otherwise occur. > [!NOTE] > 不是可繫結的屬性。 is not a bindable property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DoubleClick As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按兩下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間應間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式並事件，則和按兩下表單時，並會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下控制項時，控制項不支援事件，事件可能會引發兩次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 您必須設定`StandardDoubleClick`並`StandardClick`的值到`true`引發此事件。You must set the `StandardDoubleClick` and `StandardClick` values of to `true` for this event to be raised. 這些值可能會設定為`true`如果您繼承自現有的 Windows Form 控制項。These values might already be set to `true` if you are inheriting from existing Windows Forms controls. > [!NOTE] > 下列事件不會引發類別，除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動 索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是 索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用事件的載入文字檔案中所列成控制項。The following code example uses the event of a to load text files listed in the into a control. [!code-cpp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於某個控制項的父控制項或表單已變更之後，以程式設計方式變更其 DPI 設定時。

span.span: Occurs when the DPI setting for a control is changed programmatically after the DPI of its parent control or form has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DpiChangedBeforeParent As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於某個控制項的父控制項或表單發生 DPI 變更事件之前，以程式設計方式變更其 DPI 設定時。

span.span: Occurs when the DPI setting for a control is changed programmatically before a DPI change event for its parent control or form has occurred.

summary.span: 發生於拖放作業完成時。

span.span: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並屬性的會以螢幕座標表示，工作區座標。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. Visual C# 程式碼的下一行會將屬性轉換為用戶端。The following line of Visual C# code converts the properties to a client . ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE] > 在版本早於[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，如果您將與和Windows Form 上的事件並拖到的項目在設計階段，`DropDrop`和`DropEnter`事件引發。In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a with and events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised. 不過，當您關閉並重新開啟方案，和不會再次引發事件。However, when you close and reopen the solution, the and events are not raised again. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 此程式碼摘錄示範使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設為`None`在。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. summary.span: 發生於將物件拖出控制項界限時。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者拖曳控制項之外的資料指標，或使用者取消目前的拖放作業時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 它接著會檢查控制項為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項是有效的置放目標、與指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更，就會引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業為基礎的值事件的屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果的值是`Continue`，則就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回饋。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此當滑鼠移動經過置放目標，則使用者可以最新的回應滑鼠的位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，讓來源應用程式可以執行適當作業，資料來源; 例如，剪下資料如果作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值已`Cancel`，則就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 按鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設為`None`在。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 支援呈現為指定的點陣圖。

span.span: Supports rendering to the specified bitmap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActiveX 控制項不支援方法。The method is not supported for ActiveX controls. 您可以覆寫事件，並視需要提供自訂的列印邏輯。You can override the event and provide custom printing logic if required. 方法具有下列限制：The method has the following limitations: - 可能會擲回大型的點陣圖。An might be thrown for large bitmaps. 允許的大小上限會因電腦而異。The maximum allowable size varies by machine. - 不支援`Ink`Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 作業系統的控制項。 does not support the `Ink` controls for the Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 operating system. - 不繪製子系如果屬性設定為`false`。 does not draw a child if the property of the is set to `false`. - 在容器內的控制項是以反向順序呈現。Controls inside containers are rendered in reverse order. - 不是功能完整的; 僅限繪製點陣圖的框線。 is not fully functional for the ; only the border of a bitmap is drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，您可以啟用或停用控制項在執行階段。With the property, you can enable or disable controls at run time. 例如，您可以停用不會套用到應用程式的目前狀態的控制項。For example, you can disable controls that do not apply to the current state of the application. 您也可以停用控制項以限制其用途。You can also disable a control to restrict its use. 若要防止使用者按下它，例如停用按鈕。For example, a button can be disabled to prevent the user from clicking it. 如果控制項已停用，無法選取。If a control is disabled, it cannot be selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定屬性設`false`不會停用應用程式的 [控制] 方塊或防止應用程式視窗接收焦點。Setting the property to `false` does not disable the application's control box or prevent the application window from receiving the focus. 當容器控制項具有其已啟用的屬性設定為`false`，其包含的控制項已停用，以及。When a container control has its enabled property set to `false`, all its contained controls are disabled, as well. 例如，如果使用者按一下任一控制項內已停用控制項，不會引發事件。For example, if the user clicks on any of the controls contained in a disabled control, no events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 停用的可捲動的控制項時，捲軸也會停用。When a scrollable control is disabled, the scroll bars are also disabled. 例如，已停用的多行文字方塊是文字的無法捲動至顯示的所有行。For example, a disabled multiline textbox is unable to scroll to display all the lines of text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此範例會建立，並設定其群組方塊內。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下來，它會設定屬性群組 方塊中，並群組方塊的停駐在表單頂端。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最後，它會停用 [群組] 中設定屬性設`false`，因而導致停用群組內包含的所有控制項。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未完成非同步作業，此函式將會封鎖直到得到結果為止。If the asynchronous operation has not been completed, this function will block until the result is available. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 所有其他的方法呼叫中，您應該使用其中一種叫用方法來對控制項的執行緒的呼叫封送處理。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），藉由呼叫變更焦點或方法，或藉由設定屬性到目前表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`，則和會隱藏事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 並事件會隱藏由類別。The and events are suppressed by the class. 中的對等事件類別和事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和事件是階層式和適當的控制項為止，增加或減少的父鏈結會串聯。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假設您有具有兩個控制項，以及每個控制項有一個控制項。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 當插入號移從某個到另一個，都會引發事件並，和其他引發事件和。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設定內在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `WM_KILLFOCUS` 主題中 < 鍵盤輸入參考 > 一節和 「 訊息死結 」 一節[有關訊息和訊息佇列](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the `WM_KILLFOCUS` topic in the "Keyboard Input Reference" section and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the [About Messages and Message Queues](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用事件來變更的前景和背景色彩在特定情況下。The following code example uses the event to change the foreground and background colors of a under particular conditions. [!code-cpp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`true`如果控制項成功收到輸入的焦點。The method returns `true` if the control successfully received input focus. 控制項有輸入的焦點時未顯示擁有焦點的任何視覺提示。The control can have the input focus while not displaying any visual cues of having the focus. 下面列出的不可選取控制項主要是觀察此行為，或任何控制項衍生自它們。This behavior is primarily observed by the nonselectable controls listed below, or any controls derived from them. 控制項可以選取和接收輸入的焦點，如果所有下列都條件成立：`Selectable`的值設定為`true`，它包含在另一個控制項，其所有父控制項都都則顯示並啟用。A control can be selected and receive input focus if all the following are true: the `Selectable` value of is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 衍生自這些控制項的控制項不能也選取。Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable. - - - - - - - （當沒有出現在控制項中的連結） (when there is no link present in the control) > [!NOTE] > 低層級的方法主要被供自訂控制項的作者。 is a low-level method intended primarily for custom control authors. 應用程式設計人員應該改用方法或子控制項的屬性或表單的方法。Instead, application programmers should use the method or the property for child controls, or the method for forms. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將焦點設定為 指定，如果它可以接收焦點。The following code example sets focus to the specified , if it can receive focus. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需有關環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 因為不可變 （表示您無法調整其任一屬性），您只能指派新的屬性。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new . 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 如何調整現有的字型，讓它變成粗體的範例如下：The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```csharp myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示給使用者，並變更的控制項。The following code example displays a to the user and changes the of a control. 此範例中，您需要具有和在其上。This example requires that you have a with and a on it. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GiveFeedback As GiveFeedbackEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於拖曳作業時。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟動拖放作業時，會引發事件。The event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 使用事件中，拖曳事件來源的可修改滑鼠指標的外觀以使用者視覺化回饋提供拖放作業期間。With the event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 它接著會檢查控制項為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項是有效的置放目標、與指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更，就會引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業為基礎的值事件的屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果的值是`Continue`，則就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回饋。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此當滑鼠移動經過置放目標，則使用者可以最新的回應滑鼠的位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，讓來源應用程式可以執行適當作業，資料來源; 例如，剪下資料如果作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值已`Cancel`，則就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 按鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設為`None`在。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 發生於控制項取得焦點時。

span.span: Occurs when the control receives focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），藉由呼叫變更焦點或方法，或藉由設定屬性到目前表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`，則和會隱藏事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. **附註**和事件是低階的焦點會繫結至的 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 訊息的事件。**Note** The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常並更新時，才會使用事件或撰寫自訂控制項時。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 相反地並事件應該可用於所有的控制項，除了類別，它會使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 如需詳細資訊並事件，請參閱[WM_SETFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx)並[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_SETFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設定內在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
