remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制代碼時，會建立顯示第一次。A handle is created when the is displayed for the first time. 比方說，如果會建立具有設為`false`，則之前不會引發事件設為`true`。For example, if a is created that has set to `false`, the event will not be raised until is set to `true`. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 發生於終結控制項的控制代碼時。

span.span: Occurs when the control's handle is in the process of being destroyed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間事件，控制項仍然是有效的 Windows 控制項和可以藉由呼叫重新建立方法。During the event, the control is still a valid Windows control and the can be recreated by calling the method. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#38)]

summary.span: 取得指示控制項是否包含一或多個子控制項的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains one or more child controls.

value.span: 如果控制項包含一或多個子控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control contains one or more child controls; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中有小於或等於零，屬性會傳回`true`。If the collection has a greater than zero, the property will return `true`. 存取屬性不會強制建立如果控制項沒有子系，所以參考這個屬性可提供效能優勢時逐一查看樹狀結構的控制項。Accessing the property does not force the creation of a if the control has no children, so referencing this property can provide a performance benefit when walking a tree of controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定和為預設系統色彩的控制項。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控制項具有任何子控制項，程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫它本身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此程式碼範例，您需要與至少一個子控制項; 不過，子容器控制項，例如或，使用自己的子控制項會更適當展現遞迴。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.

value.span: 控制項的高度 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The height of the control in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所做的變更並屬性值會使變更控制項的屬性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. > [!NOTE] > 衍生的控制項的最小高度為一個像素。The minimum height for the derived control is one pixel. 預設高度控制項是三個像素。The default height for the control is three pixels. 設定的高度小於其中一個會的屬性值重設的預設高度控制的值。Setting the height of the control to a value less than one will reset the property value to the default height. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立三個表單上的控制項，並使用不同的大小以及位置相關屬性會設定它們的大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此範例中，您需要具有寬度和高度的最少 300 像素。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CPP/controlsizelocation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CS/controlsizelocation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/VB/controlsizelocation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event HelpRequested As HelpEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者要求控制項的說明時。

span.span: Occurs when the user requests help for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者按下 F1 時，通常會引發事件索引鍵或相關聯的即時線上說明 按鈕已按下。The event is commonly raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive help button is clicked. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何處理包含四個位址欄位的表單上顯示自訂 [說明] 內容的事件。The following code example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 按下 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中，或使用即時線上 [說明] 按鈕，然後按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標，會引發事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 屬性設定為 true，表示`HelpRequested`處理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 此範例也示範如何將儲存中的說明文字屬性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 對使用者隱藏控制項。

span.span: Conceals the control from the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隱藏控制項就相當於屬性設`false`。Hiding the control is equivalent to setting the property to `false`. 在後呼叫方法時，屬性傳回的值`false`直到呼叫方法。After the method is called, the property returns a value of `false` until the method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會在按一下按鈕時，按下 CTRL 鍵時隱藏 按鈕。The following code example hides a button if the CTRL key is pressed when the button is clicked. 此範例中，您需要名為`button1`上。This example requires that you have a named `button1` on a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CPP/controlmembers4.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CS/controlmembers4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/VB/controlmembers4.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的輸入法 (IME) 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of the control.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks IME 是程式可讓使用者輸入複雜字元和符號，例如日文漢字字元，使用標準鍵盤。An IME is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, using a standard keyboard. 屬性通常會設定為如旨在只輸入數值的控制項。The property is typically set to for a control that is intended to only enter numeric values. 屬性值設定為如類別。The property value is set to for the class. 大部分的類別不直接支援輸入法編輯器，或允許從 IME，直接輸入將會設定此屬性的值。Most classes that do not directly support Input Method Editors, or allow direct input from an IME, will set the value of this property to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用者可以互動方式變更除非它已經程式設計方式設定。The user can interactively change the unless it has been programmatically set to . 在此情況下，使用者將無法使用輸入法。In this case, the user will not be able to use the IME. > > 全域輸入的模式為作用中時，將會忽略在 Windows 8 上的屬性。The property is ignored on Windows 8 when the global input mode is in effect. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 參數的文字輸入變更從每個執行緒為每位使用者](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509)。For more info, see [Switch Text Input Changed from Per-Thread to Per-User](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).

exception.span: 所指派的值不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 發生於 屬性變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件屬性變更時以程式設計方式修改或透過互動。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction. 不支援輸入法管理員的控制項將永遠不會引發這個事件。Controls that do not support Input Method Managers will never raise this event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數個方法名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應的屬性名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更要如果數字為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此範例中，您需要，其中包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CPP/propertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CS/propertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/VB/propertychangedevents.vb#1)]

abstract member InitLayout : unit -> unit override this.InitLayout : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在控制項加入其他容器後呼叫。

span.span: Called after the control has been added to another container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將控制項新增至容器之後，立即呼叫方法。The method is called immediately after adding a control to a container. 方法可讓控制項以初始化它根據其容器的配置狀態。The method enables a control to initialize its layout state based on its container. 例如，您則通常適用錨定和停駐在控制項方法。For example, you would typically apply anchoring and docking to the control in the method.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，以便正確地顯示控制項。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is displayed correctly.

summary.span: 使控制項的特定區域失效，並且造成傳送繪製訊息至控制項。

span.span: Invalidates a specific region of the control and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Invalidate() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 讓控制項的整個介面失效，並重新繪製控制項。

span.span: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法不會強制同步小畫家; 若要強制同步小畫家，請呼叫方法之後呼叫方法。Calling the method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the method after calling the method. 呼叫這個方法時，不含任何參數，會將整個工作區加入到更新區域。When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用卸除使用者映像或映像檔拖曳至表單，並讓它顯示在其上的點。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製的映像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會保留直到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法會決定所拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為並的值為螢幕座標，此範例會使用將它們轉換成工作區座標中的方法。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於控制項的顯示需要重新繪製時。

span.span: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#40)]

summary.span: 在擁有控制項基礎視窗控制代碼的執行緒上執行委派。

span.span: Executes a delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Invoke(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Function Invoke (method As Delegate) As Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: method
param.span: 委派，包含要在控制項執行緒內容中呼叫的方法。

span.span: A delegate that contains a method to be called in the control's thread context.

summary.span: 在擁有控制項基礎視窗控制代碼的執行緒上執行指定的委派。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

returns.span: 來自所叫用的委派的傳回值，或者如果委派沒有任何傳回值，則為 。

span.span: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or if the delegate has no return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派就類似在 C 或 c + + 語言中的函式指標。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委派會封裝內委派物件的方法的參考。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 委派物件接著傳遞至程式碼呼叫受參考的方法，並在編譯時期，會叫用的方法可以是未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 不同於在 C 或 c + + 中的函式指標，委派是物件導向、 型別安全且更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 方法會搜尋控制項的父鏈結，直到它找到一個控制項或表單已期間之處理，如果尚不存在目前的控制項基礎視窗控制代碼。The method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that has a window handle if the current control's underlying window handle does not exist yet. 如果找不到任何適當的控制代碼，方法會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method will throw an exception. 在呼叫期間引發的例外狀況會傳播回呼叫端。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 所有其他的方法呼叫中，您應該使用其中一種叫用方法來對控制項的執行緒的呼叫封送處理。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委派可以是執行個體，在此情況下的傳送者參數會包含此控制項中，與事件參數會包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委派也可以是執行個體，或任何其他委派會使用 void 參數清單。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 呼叫或委派的速度會比其他類型的委派呼叫。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為使用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示包含委派的控制項。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委派所封裝的方法，將項目加入清單方塊中，並擁有表單的基礎控制代碼的執行緒上執行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form. 當使用者按一下按鈕，`Invoke`執行委派。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. [!code-cpp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CPP/control_invoke2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CS/control_invoke2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/VB/control_invoke2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派就類似在 C 或 c + + 語言中的函式指標。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委派會封裝內委派物件的方法的參考。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 委派物件接著傳遞至程式碼呼叫受參考的方法，並在編譯時期，會叫用的方法可以是未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 不同於在 C 或 c + + 中的函式指標，委派是物件導向、 型別安全且更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 如果尚不存在的控制項控點，直到它找到的控制項或表單沒有視窗控制代碼，這個方法會搜尋控制項的父鏈結。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何適當的控制代碼，這個方法會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, this method throws an exception. 在呼叫期間引發的例外狀況會傳播回呼叫端。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 所有其他的方法呼叫中，您應該使用其中一種叫用方法來對控制項的執行緒的呼叫封送處理。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委派可以是執行個體，在此情況下的傳送者參數會包含此控制項中，與事件參數會包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委派也可以是執行個體，或任何其他委派會使用 void 參數清單。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 呼叫或委派的速度會比其他類型的委派呼叫。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為使用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示包含委派的控制項。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委派所封裝的方法，將項目加入清單方塊中，並擁有的表單中，使用指定的引數的基礎控制代碼的執行緒上執行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form, using the specified arguments. 當使用者按一下按鈕，`Invoke`執行委派。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokeRequired As Boolean
public: property bool InvokeRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得一個值。這個值會指示是否由於呼叫端是在建立控制項之執行緒以外的執行緒，因此在進行控制項的方法呼叫時，應呼叫叫用 (Invoke) 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the caller must call an invoke method when making method calls to the control because the caller is on a different thread than the one the control was created on.

value.span: 如果控制項的 是在呼叫執行緒以外的執行緒上建立，則為 (表示必須透過叫用方法呼叫)，否則為 。

span.span: if the control's was created on a different thread than the calling thread (indicating that you must make calls to the control through an invoke method); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Forms 控制項繫結至特定的執行緒，而且不具備執行緒安全。Controls in Windows Forms are bound to a specific thread and are not thread safe. 如果您從不同的執行緒呼叫控制項的方法，您必須使用控制項的叫用封送處理至適當的執行緒呼叫的方法。Therefore, if you are calling a control's method from a different thread, you must use one of the control's invoke methods to marshal the call to the proper thread. 這個屬性可用來判斷是否您必須呼叫叫用方法，如果您不知道哪個執行緒擁有控制項就很有用。This property can be used to determine if you must call an invoke method, which can be useful if you do not know what thread owns a control. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全地呼叫執行緒的四種方法： ，，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe to call: ,, and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 所有其他方法呼叫中，您應該使用其中一種從不同的執行緒呼叫時，叫用方法。For all other method calls, you should use one of these invoke methods when calling from a different thread. 如果尚不存在的控制項控點，搜尋註冊控制項的父鏈結，直到它找到的控制項或沒有視窗控制代碼的表單。If the control's handle does not yet exist, searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何適當的控點，方法會傳回`false`。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method returns `false`. 這表示可能會傳回`false`如果不需要 （呼叫，就會發生在相同執行緒上），或如果不同的執行緒上建立控制項，但尚未建立控制項的控制代碼。This means that can return `false` if is not required (the call occurs on the same thread), or if the control was created on a different thread but the control's handle has not yet been created. 在尚未建立控制項的控制代碼的情況下，您不應該直接呼叫屬性、 方法或事件在控制項上。In the case where the control's handle has not yet been created, you should not simply call properties, methods, or events on the control. 這可能會造成要建立隔離的執行緒，而不需要訊息幫浦上的控制項，並讓該應用程式不穩定的背景執行緒上的控制項的控制代碼。This might cause the control's handle to be created on the background thread, isolating the control on a thread without a message pump and making the application unstable. 您可以保護針對此案例也檢查值時傳回`false`背景執行緒上。You can protect against this case by also checking the value of when returns `false` on a background thread. 如果尚未建立的控制項控點，您必須等到它建立後，再呼叫或。If the control handle has not yet been created, you must wait until it has been created before calling or . 通常，這是背景執行緒會在應用程式的主要表單的建構函式時，才 (如同`Application.Run(new MainForm())`，然後才能在顯示表單或`Application.Run`已呼叫。Typically, this happens only if a background thread is created in the constructor of the primary form for the application (as in `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, before the form has been shown or `Application.Run` has been called. 一個解決方案是等到之前啟動背景執行緒已建立表單的控點。One solution is to wait until the form's handle has been created before starting the background thread. 請藉由呼叫強制控制代碼建立屬性或等到啟動背景程序的事件。Either force handle creation by calling the property, or wait until the event to start the background process. 更好的解決方案是使用`SynchronizationContext`所傳回而不是跨執行緒封送處理的控制項。An even better solution is to use the `SynchronizationContext` returned by rather than a control for cross-thread marshaling. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為使用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. 如需有關多執行緒的 Windows Form 控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:使用背景執行緒搜尋檔案](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md)和[How to:Windows Form 控制項的安全執行緒呼叫](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Use a Background Thread to Search for Files](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md) and [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性會傳回`true`，控制項處置和不再被參考為有效的 Windows 控制項。When this property returns `true`, the control is disposed of and can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使控制項的執行個體已經處置，它仍然會保留在記憶體中移除從透過記憶體回收的記憶體之前。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 處置控制項時，您不能呼叫其方法。When a control is disposed, you cannot call its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以判斷所指定的字元是否`charCode`參數是控制項要輸入的字元。Call the method to determine whether the character specified by the `charCode` parameter is an input character that the control wants. 在視窗訊息來判斷指定的輸入的字元是否應前置處理過或直接傳送到控制項前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`true`，指定的字元會直接傳送至控制項。If returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`false`，指定的字元是前置處理過的並只傳送至控制項，如果它不由前置處理階段。If returns `false`, the specified character is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否為另一個控制項的助憶鍵。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以判斷是否由指定的索引鍵`keyData`參數是控制項要輸入索引鍵。Call the method to determine whether the key specified by the `keyData` parameter is an input key that the control wants. 在視窗訊息以判斷應該經過前置處理或直接傳送到控制項指定的輸入索引鍵前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input key should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`true`，指定索引鍵會直接傳送至控制項。If returns `true`, the specified key is sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`false`，指定索引鍵是前置處理過的並只傳送至控制項，如果它不由前置處理階段。If returns `false`, the specified key is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 會前置處理過的索引鍵包括 [] 索引標籤、 傳回、 esc 鍵，以及向上、 向下鍵、 向左鍵和向右箭號的索引鍵。Keys that are preprocessed include the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW keys. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何覆寫方法控制項。The following code example shows you how to override the method for a control. 在此範例中，`TabTextBox`類別處理 TAB 鍵。In this example, the `TabTextBox` class handles the TAB key. 當`TabTextBox`有焦點，而且使用者按下 TAB 鍵在文字插入點，加入四個空格取代任何選取的文字。When the `TabTextBox` has the focus and the user presses the TAB key four spaces are added at the text insertion point, replacing any selected text. 根據預設，控制項處理 TAB 鍵，將輸入的焦點移至下一個控制項。By default, the control handles the TAB key by moving the input focus to the next control. 在此情況下，keypress 永遠不會到達方法覆寫。In this case, the keypress never reaches the method override. 若要防止這個預設行為，方法覆寫會傳回`true`當使用者按下 TAB 鍵。To prevent this default behavior, the method override returns `true` when the user presses the TAB key. 針對所有其他的按鍵方法覆寫會傳回呼叫方法的基底類別版本的結果。For all other keypresses, the method override returns the result of calling the base-class version of the method. summary.span: 發生於按下按鍵且焦點在控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵的事件發生順序如下：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用以接收鍵盤事件的其他控制項，將在您的表單中的屬性事件處理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 特定金鑰，例如 tab 鍵，傳回時，esc 鍵，和箭號會自動處理控制項。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要有這些索引鍵，會引發您必須覆寫事件，您的表單上的每個控制項中的方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 覆寫的程式碼想要判斷其中一個特殊按鍵已按下，並傳回值`true`。The code for the override of the would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 而不是覆寫方法中，您可以處理事件以及組屬性設`true`。Instead of overriding the method, you can handle the event and set the property to `true`. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱事件。For a code example, see the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件，以判斷輸入控制項的字元類型。The following code example uses the event to determine the type of character entered into the control. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範的引發順序， ，事件，以及如何註冊其上的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates the order of raising the , , events, and how to register event handlers on them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵的事件發生順序如下：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 空間和退格鍵以外的非字元按鍵不會引發事件; 不過，非字元按鍵並會引發和事件。The event is not raised by non-character keys other than space and backspace; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用範例在執行階段，以使用或修改子集的常見按鍵的按鍵輸入的屬性。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用以接收鍵盤事件的其他控制項，將在您的表單中的屬性事件處理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件，以避免字元輸入控制項。The following code example uses the event to prevent characters from entering the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵的事件發生順序如下：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用以接收鍵盤事件的其他控制項，將在您的表單中的屬性事件處理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 特定金鑰，例如 tab 鍵，傳回時，esc 鍵，和箭號會自動處理控制項。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要有這些索引鍵，會引發您必須覆寫事件，您的表單上的每個控制項中的方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 覆寫的程式碼想要判斷其中一個特殊按鍵已按下，並傳回值`true`。The code for the override of would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用事件類別，以顯示快顯樣式協助使用者。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user. summary.span: 發生於控制項應重新調整其子控制項位置時。

span.span: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子控制項新增或移除時的界限所控制的變更，以及其他變更時，可能會影響控制項的配置時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 配置事件可以使用隱藏和方法。The layout event can be suppressed using the and methods. 暫止配置可讓您在控制項上執行多個動作，而不需要執行的每個變更的版面配置。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果您調整大小並移動控制項時，每個作業會引發事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例中心在螢幕上事件。The following code example centers a on the screen in the event. 這會避開置中隨著使用者調整它的格式。This will keep the form centered as the user resizes it. 這個範例需要您已建立控制項。This example requires that you have created a control. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Leave As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於輸入焦點離開控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），藉由呼叫變更焦點或方法，或藉由設定屬性到目前表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`，則和會隱藏事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 並事件會隱藏由類別。The and events are suppressed by the class. 中的對等事件類別和事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和事件是階層式和適當的控制項為止，增加或減少的父鏈結會串聯。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假設您有具有兩個控制項，以及每個控制項有一個控制項。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 當插入號移從某個到另一個，都會引發事件並，和其他引發事件和。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設定內在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件，以重設為其先前狀態的控制項。The following code example uses the event to reset a control to its former state. [!code-cpp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），藉由呼叫變更焦點或方法，或藉由設定屬性到目前表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`，則和會隱藏事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果的屬性設為`true`中事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件會隱藏事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件是低階的焦點會繫結至的 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 訊息的事件。The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常並更新時，才會使用事件或撰寫自訂控制項時。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 相反地並事件應該可用於所有的控制項，除了類別，它會使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 如需詳細資訊並事件，請參閱[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)並[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設定內在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範驗證文字，以將 TextBox1。The following code example demonstrates validating the text for TextBox1. 它也會示範如何處理藉由設定事件TextBox1 中的文字的屬性。It also demonstrates handling the event by setting the property to the text in TextBox1. 所使用的程式碼範例方法來開啟檔案對話方塊之前檢查是否發生錯誤。The code example used the method to check for an error before opening the file dialog box. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`TextBox1`，則名為`OpenFileDialog1`，則名為`Button1`，和名為`ErrorProvider1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 請確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在罕見的情況下，您可能需要偵測未預期的輸入。In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input. 例如，請考慮下列案例。For example, consider the following scenarios. - 滑鼠作業時，使用者會按下 Windows 鍵或 CTRL + esc 鍵開啟 [開始] 功能表。During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. - 滑鼠作業時，使用者會切換成另一個程式藉由按下 ALT + TAB。During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB. - 滑鼠作業時，另一個程式顯示視窗或接受焦點離開目前的應用程式的訊息方塊。During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application. 滑鼠的作業可能包括按一下，然後將滑鼠指標在表單或控制項，或執行滑鼠拖曳作業。Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation. 如果您有可偵測在表單或控制項失去滑鼠捕捉這些及相關未預期的情況下，您可以使用事件。If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates the event for a control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/vb/form1.vb#1)] 若要測試此範例中，執行偵錯工具，請按 F5。To test this example, run it in the debugger by pressing F5. 開啟**輸出**Visual Studio 視窗中的，讓您可以看到當引發事件。Open the **Output** window in Visual Studio so that you can see when events are raised. 按一下 並注意下列輸出。Click the and notice the following output. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseUp` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged` 現在，按一下並按住滑鼠左鍵控制項。Now, click and hold the left mouse button on the control. 同時仍按一下滑鼠，請按 ALT + TAB，切換到另一個程式。While still clicking the mouse, press ALT+TAB to switch to another program. 請注意，就會引發事件，讓您以可能處理這種情況。Notice that the event is raised enabling you to potentially handle this scenario. 根據您的動作，可能不會引發事件。Depending on your actions, the event might not be raised. 您也可以嘗試這項測試使用的 Windows 鍵或 CTRL + esc 鍵。You can also try this test with the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 讓人覺得喪氣滑鼠按鈕，在游標通常位於控制項上方時，會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 進行這項連線，就無法停用各種事件的控制項類別中。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. 兩個單一發生關閉足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將產生的點擊事件，而第二個不事件。Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a event instead of the second event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是控制項的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它們通常會受到其他動作，例如按下 ENTER 鍵，且焦點在控制項時引發。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 發生於以滑鼠按兩下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生於使用者按下滑鼠按鈕兩次連續快速地在資料指標停留在控制項時。The event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control. 從按兩下分隔單一點選兩次的時間間隔取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定。The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 這類使用者的動作會在執行時，控制項即會引發下列一系列的事件：The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 5. 事件。 event. 6. 事件。 event. 7. 事件。 event. 8. 事件。 event. 進行這項連線，就無法停用各種事件的控制項類別中。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是控制項的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它們可能會發生的其他使用者動作，例如快速鍵組合。They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#55)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#55)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 下列事件不會引發類別，除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動 索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是 索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製滑鼠路徑。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 加入直線線段針對每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新的圖形方法呼叫上每個`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，增加或相應減少時捲動到圖形的路徑就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，在畫面中，以及識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型用法是 （"停留矩形 」） 的控制項周圍的指定區域內的控制項上的滑鼠停留時顯示工具提示。A typical use of is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle"). 會引發這個事件所需的暫停指定以毫秒為單位的屬性。The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the property. 定義和偵測到與事件和屬性。The event is defined and detected in connection with the and properties. 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 下列事件不會引發類別，除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動 索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是 索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製滑鼠路徑。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 加入直線線段針對每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新的圖形方法呼叫上每個`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，增加或相應減少時捲動到圖形的路徑就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，在畫面中，以及識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. summary.span: 取得滑鼠游標在螢幕座標中的位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.

value.span: ，包含與螢幕左上角相對的滑鼠游標座標。

span.span: A that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回，表示滑鼠資料指標位置在參考屬性時的時間。The property returns a that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced. 表示在畫面上，不是相對於控制項的位置的座標，而會傳回，而不論是否位於控制項上方。The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control. 畫面的左上角的座標為 0，0。The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0. 屬性等於屬性。The property is identical to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將進入可編輯狀態時使用者按下 ALT + E，當滑鼠游標位於樹狀節點標籤。The following code example puts a label into an editable state when the user presses ALT+E while the mouse cursor is over the tree node. 在使用者完成之後編輯標籤，標籤不能編輯一次直到再次按下 ALT + E 按鍵組合。After the user is done editing the label, the labels cannot be edited again until the ALT+E key combination is pressed again. 此範例中，您需要上。This example requires that you have a on a . 樹狀檢視也應該至少一個在其集合。The tree view should also have at least one in its collection. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseWheel As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於滑鼠滾輪移動且焦點在控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當處理請務必遵循與滑鼠滾輪相關聯的使用者介面 (UI) 標準的事件。When handling the event it is important to follow the user interface (UI) standards associated with the mouse wheel. 屬性值，表示已移動滑鼠滾輪的量。The property value indicates the amount the mouse wheel has been moved. 當累積的差異是加號或減號 120 時，應該捲動 UI。The UI should scroll when the accumulated delta is plus or minus 120. UI 應該捲動的邏輯所傳回的行數達到每個差異值的屬性。The UI should scroll the number of logical lines returned by the property for every delta value reached. 您也可以捲動更順利地在較小，120 單位的增量，不過比例應該保持不變，也就是行捲動滾輪的移動 120 差異單位每。You can also scroll more smoothly in smaller that 120 unit increments, however the ratio should remain constant, that is lines scrolled per 120 delta units of wheel movement. 如需有關處理滑鼠滾輪訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information about handling mouse wheel messages, see the [WM_MOUSEWHEEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製滑鼠路徑。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 加入直線線段針對每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新的圖形方法呼叫上每個`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，增加或相應減少時捲動到圖形的路徑就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，在畫面中，以及識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CPP/mouseeventexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CS/mouseeventexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/VB/mouseeventexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件，以在螢幕座標中表單的標題列上顯示表單的位置。The following code example uses the event to display the location of the form in screen coordinates on the caption bar of the form. [!code-cpp[Control.Move#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Move/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Move#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Move/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Move#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Move/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the control.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以在執行階段中用來評估物件，依名稱而不是型別和程式設計名稱。The property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name. 因為屬性會傳回型別，它可以評估在大小寫樣式邏輯陳述式中 (`Select`在 Visual Basic 中的陳述式`switch`陳述式在 Visual C# 和[!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)])。Because the property returns a type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in Visual Basic, `switch` statement in Visual C# and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示中之控制項的新增或移除表單控制項時。The following code example displays the of a control in a when the control is added or removed from a form. [!code-cpp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數個方法名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed`會引發對應*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應的屬性名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更要如果數字為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此範例中，您需要的類別，衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數個方法名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed`會引發對應*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應的屬性名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更要如果數字為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此範例中，您需要的類別，衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件及一般停駐和錨定到運作的函式。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event and for typical docking and anchoring functions to work.

para.span: 在衍生的類別應該覆寫這個方法，以進行任何自訂的版面配置邏輯。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數個方法名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed`會引發對應*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應的屬性名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName* `Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更要如果數字為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此範例中，您需要的類別，衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. span.span: Notifies the control of Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫方法的控制項`EnableNotifyMessage`中設定樣式位元。The method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in . `EnableNotifyMessage`中設定樣式啟用的控制項時收到通知方法會接收 Windows 訊息。The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in enables the control to be notified when the method receives a Windows message. 使用此方法，完全信任的控制項可以接聽的 Windows 訊息而不讓他們能夠修改訊息。With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法不需要，因為沒有任何初始實作。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, calling the base class's method is not necessary because there is no initial implementation.

Protected Overridable Sub OnPaddingChanged (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnPaddingChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnPaddingChanged : EventArgs -> unit

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者映像或映像檔拖曳至表單，並將其顯示在其上置放之處。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on which it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製的映像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會保留直到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法會決定所拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為並的值為螢幕座標，此範例會使用將它們轉換成工作區座標中的方法。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Raises the event when the property value of the control's container changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數個方法名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed`會引發對應*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應的屬性名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更要如果數字為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此範例中，您需要的類別，衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用卸除使用者映像或映像檔拖曳至表單，並讓它顯示在其上的點。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製的映像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會保留直到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法會決定所拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為並的值為螢幕座標，此範例會使用將它們轉換成工作區座標中的方法。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫應用程式的前置處理輸入的訊息，再將它們分派的訊息迴圈。 is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched. 可能值為`msg`參數是 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR. 在覆寫，控制項應該傳回`true`指出它已處理訊息。When overriding , a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message. 控制項的結果不會處理的訊息`base.PreProcessMessage`應該傳回。For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned. 控制項將通常會覆寫其中一個更具特製化的方法這類， ， ， ，或而不是覆寫。Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as , , , , or instead of overriding .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewKeyDown As PreviewKeyDownEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於焦點位於這個控制項上時並按下鍵盤按鍵的 事件之前。

span.span: Occurs before the event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些按鍵動作，例如 索引標籤、 傳回時，esc 鍵和方向鍵，某些控制項通常會忽略，因為它們不會被視為輸入的按鍵動作。Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses. 例如，根據預設，控制項會忽略方向鍵。For example, by default, a control ignores the arrow keys. 按下方向鍵時，通常會導致焦點移至前一個或下一個控制項。Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control. 瀏覽鍵並按下這些機碼通常不會引發，方向鍵會被視為事件。The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the event for a . 不過，按下的箭號索引鍵確實會提高事件。However, pressing the arrow keys for a does raise the event. 藉由處理事件和設定屬性設`true`，您可以提高事件時按下方向鍵。By handling the event for a and setting the property to `true`, you can raise the event when the arrow keys are pressed. 不過，如果您處理的箭頭按鍵，將不會再將焦點移到上一個或下一個控制項。However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範，其中包含。The following code example demonstrates a that includes a . 當有焦點，而且您按下向上鍵或向下箭號按鍵，隨即出現。When the has the focus and you press the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys, the appears. 事件處理常式偵測何時按下向上鍵或向下鍵的按鍵，並設定屬性設`true`。The event handler detects when the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys are pressed and sets the property to `true`. 這會引發事件，讓您可以顯示。This raises the event so that you can display the . 您不應該放置任何邏輯事件處理常式，而非以設定屬性。You should not put any logic in the event handler, other than to set the property. 相反地，您應該將您的邏輯放在事件處理常式。Instead, you should put your logic in the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/vb/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理命令按鍵前置處理的訊息，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令按鍵是一律優先於一般輸入按鍵的按鍵。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令索引鍵的範例包括加速器和功能表的捷徑。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 此方法必須傳回`true`指出它已處理命令按鍵，或`false`表示索引鍵不 command 機碼。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法會先判斷控制項是否有，和如果是的話，可讓處理命令按鍵。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果 command 機碼不是功能表快顯控制項具有父代，要將金鑰傳遞至父系的方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 結果會是該金鑰 「 反昇 」 的控制階層架構的命令。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 除了使用者按下索引鍵，索引鍵的資料也會指出這，如果有的話，在按下輔助按鍵與索引鍵相同的時間。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 輔助按鍵可包含 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 鍵。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法稱為由子控制項的子控制項接收鍵盤訊息。This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message. 子控制項產生訊息的任何鍵盤事件之前呼叫這個方法。The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message. 如果此方法傳回`true`，子控制項視為處理的訊息，並不會產生任何鍵盤事件。If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events. `m`參數包含要預覽的視窗訊息。The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview. 可能值為屬性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。Possible values for the property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP. 方法只是傳送至父代的字元方法，則傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 讓控制項可以處理助憶鍵字元，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法應該判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，而且是否指定的字元是否代表助憶鍵。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 實作這個方法通常會使用方法，以判斷指定的字元是否符合助憶鍵在控制項的文字。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如：For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 預設實作方法只會傳回`false`指出控制項是否有任何的助憶鍵。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫 按鈕類別的延伸出現自訂行為的方法。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 此範例也示範如何使用和屬性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要執行此範例會將下列程式碼的表單類別之後，在相同的檔案。To run this example paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 新增類型的按鈕`MnemonicButton`至表單。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#1)]
