MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryAccessibilityHelp As QueryAccessibilityHelpEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 為協助工具應用程式提供說明時。

span.span: Occurs when is providing help to accessibility applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該使用類別，以讓使用者能夠按 F1 鍵來叫用可存取的物件上的說明。You should use the class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key. 使用中的完整資訊為您提供。Using the provides you with complete information in the . 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製它不會由圖表控制項中，沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄會示範如何處理事件。This code excerpt demonstrates handling the event. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryContinueDrag As QueryContinueDragEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於拖放作業時，讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

span.span: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業期間鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更時，會引發事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation. 事件可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。The event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 它接著會檢查控制項為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項是有效的置放目標、與指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更，就會引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業為基礎的值事件的屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果的值是`Continue`，則就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回饋。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此當滑鼠移動經過置放目標，則使用者可以最新的回應滑鼠的位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，讓來源應用程式可以執行適當作業，資料來源; 例如，剪下資料如果作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值已`Cancel`，則就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 根據預設，事件集要`Cancel`中如果已按下 ESC 鍵，並設定來`Drop`中如果按下滑鼠左、 置中 或右按鈕。By default, the event sets to `Cancel` in if the ESC key was pressed and sets to `Drop` in if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example requires that two cursor files,`3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 按鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設為`None`在。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視窗區域是作業系統，允許的繪圖視窗內的像素為單位的集合。The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing. 作業系統不會顯示視窗位於視窗區域以外的任何部分。The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region. 控制項座標是區域的相對於控制項，而非工作區控制項的左上角。The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control. > [!NOTE] > 包含與區域的像素為單位的集合可以是不連續的。The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來建立圓角的按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property by creating a round button. 若要執行此範例，貼上下列程式碼中包含名稱為按鈕的表單`roundButton`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a button called `roundButton`. 這個範例需要事件所連接的範例中所定義的事件處理常式。This example requires that the event is connected to the event handler defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷重新調整過大小的控制項，您可以轉型`sender`已註冊之參數方法，以並取得其屬性 (或和屬性個別）。To determine the of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered method to a and get its property (or and properties individually). 若要處理自訂的版面配置，請使用而不是調整大小事件的事件。To handle custom layouts, use the event instead of the Resize event. 就會引發事件以回應事件，同時也以回應其他會影響控制項的版面配置的變更。The event is raised in response to a event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件的。The following code example handles the event of a . 當表單的大小時，事件處理常式可確保表單保持正方形 (及其和仍相同)。When the form is resized, the event handler ensures that the form stays square (its and remain equal). 若要執行此範例中，請確定與此事件處理方法相關聯表單的事件。To run this example, make sure and associate this event-handling method with the form's event. summary.span: 繼續平常的配置邏輯。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法會強制立即配置，如有任何暫止配置要求。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 並方法一起用來隱藏多個事件，當您調整多個控制項的屬性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，您通常會呼叫方法，然後將， ， ，或屬性，以及與的控制項，然後呼叫方法，讓變更生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必須有任何暫止呼叫針對成功呼叫。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個按鈕加入至表單。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 範例交易使用按鈕的加法和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法會強制立即配置，如有任何暫止配置要求。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 當`performLayout`參數設為`true`，如果有任何暫止配置要求，就會發生立即配置。When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests. 並方法一起用來隱藏多個事件，當您調整多個控制項的屬性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，您通常會呼叫方法，然後將， ， ，或屬性，以及與的控制項，然後呼叫方法，讓變更生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必須有任何暫止呼叫針對成功呼叫。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 將數個控制項加入至父控制項中，建議您呼叫方法之前初始化要加入的控制項。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 之後將控制項加入至父控制項，呼叫方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 這會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需有關環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 屬性適用於國際應用程式的語言由右至左，例如希伯來文或阿拉伯文的寫入位置。The property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic. 當這個屬性設定為，包含文字的控制項項目會由右至左顯示。When this property is set to , control elements that include text are displayed from right to left. > [!NOTE] > 如果值屬性在執行階段變更，但不含格式只有未經處理的文字會保留。If the value of the property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. 以下是一些範例控制項項目會受到屬性值為:The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the property value of : - 垂直捲軸會顯示於左側，而不是可捲動的控制項的右端 (例如，多行，和)。Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, , , multiline , and ). - 水平捲軸的開頭為靠右對齊的捲動方塊 （捲動方塊）。Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned. - 所控制的核取方塊項目對齊`CheckAlign`屬性，已反轉和控制項。The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for and controls. - 在清單方塊、 下拉式方塊中，上下按鈕控制項中的項目會靠右對齊。Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned. - 移和下移按鈕是 靠左對齊，在和控制項。Up and down buttons are left-aligned on and controls. - 功能表 (， ，和) 會顯示為靠右對齊。Menus (, , and ) are displayed right-aligned. - 在工具列按鈕的對齊控制項或畫面上的文字的對齊方式不會受到屬性。The alignment of toolbar buttons on a control or the alignment of text on a is not affected by the property. - 支援由右至左對齊;不過，ActiveX 控制項上的效果取決於控制項作者實作支援由右至左顯示的範圍。 supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件屬性會變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數個方法名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應的屬性名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更要如果數字為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此範例中，您需要，其中包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed`和`forward`容器樣式控制項使用的參數。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 當`directed`參數設定為`true`，則`forward`參數進行評估以判斷哪一個控制項來選取。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 當`forward`設為`true`，選取定位順序中的下一個控制項; 時`false`，選取上一個控制項的定位順序。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟用定位順序中的下一個控制項，如果控制項的`Selectable`樣式位元設為`true`在，它包含在另一個控制項，其所有父控制項都則顯示並啟用。The method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 控制項衍生自清單中的控制項也不會被選取。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （當沒有出現在控制項中的連結） (when there is no link present in the control) 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），藉由呼叫變更焦點或方法，或藉由設定屬性到目前表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`，則和會隱藏事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範某些控制項的表單中使用的方法。The following code exampleshows the method being used in a form that has some controls. 每次您按一下表單，就會啟動下一個控制項。Each time that you click the form, the next control is activated. 屬性會取得容器控制項中目前作用中的控制項。The property gets the currently active control in the container control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是實值型別 (`Structure` Visual Basic 中`struct`Visual C# 中)，便會傳回值，表示存取的屬性會傳回一份控制項的大小。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in Visual Basic, `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control. 因此，調整或的屬性傳回從這個屬性不會影響或的控制項。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the or of the control. 若要調整或控制項，您必須將控制項的或屬性或組具有新屬性。To adjust the or of the control, you must set the control's or property, or set the property with a new . > [!NOTE] > 若要維持較佳的效能，不會設定其建構函式中的控制項。To maintain better performance, do not set the of a control in its constructor. 慣用的方法是覆寫屬性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 系統上，大小受到監視的高度與最大像素寬度。On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 它會設定下一步調整大小的按鈕，以相同的大小和。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定要`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會新增事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此範例中，您需要名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 建議您最好使用事件以處理自訂的版面配置。It is preferable to use the event to handle custom layouts. 就會引發事件以回應事件，同時也在其他版面配置可能需要套用的條件。The event is raised in response to events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied. 如果會引發這個事件屬性會變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件。The following code example demonstrates the event. 執行個體控制項已提供，您可以水平及垂直調整。An instance of a control has been provided that can be scaled both horizontally and vertically. A執行個體會提供水平及垂直調整值。A instance provides the horizontal and vertical scale value. 具名執行個體 **[確定]** 用來設定的小數位數值控制項執行個體。The instance named **OK** is used to set the scale values for the control instance. 每當控制項的大小變更時，相關聯的事件處理常式呼叫控制項的事件。Whenever the size of the control changes, the event handler associated with the event of the control is called. 這個事件處理常式會顯示訊息方塊，表示控制項的大小已變更。This event handler displays a message box indicating that the size of the control has changed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生事件時旗標已加入或變更。The event occurs when flags have been added or changed. 如果控制項樣式變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動，就會引發這個事件。This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 暫停控制項的配置邏輯。

span.span: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的配置邏輯會暫停直到呼叫方法。The layout logic of the control is suspended until the method is called. 並方法一起用來隱藏多個事件，當您調整多個控制項的屬性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，您通常會呼叫方法，然後將， ， ，或屬性，以及與的控制項，然後呼叫方法，讓變更生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必須有任何暫止呼叫針對成功呼叫。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 將數個控制項加入至父控制項中，建議您呼叫方法之前初始化要加入的控制項。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 之後將控制項加入至父控制項，呼叫方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 這會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個按鈕加入至表單。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 範例交易使用按鈕的加法和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項容器中的控制項定位順序。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.

value.span: 在控制項集合內的控制項之索引值 (在其容器內)。

span.span: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.

value.span: 容器內的控制項會包含在定位順序中。

span.span: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定位點索引可以包含任何有效的整數大於或等於零，較低的數字，在稍早的定位順序。A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order. 如果相同的父控制項上的多個控制項都有相同的索引，則控制項疊置順序會決定的順序，以循環的控制項。If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls. 控制項包含在定位順序，其屬性必須設為`true`。For a control to be included in the tab order, its property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 它會設定下一步調整大小的按鈕，以相同的大小和。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定要`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會新增事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此範例中，您需要名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自任何型別類別可以指派給這個屬性。Any type derived from the class can be assigned to this property. 如果透過 Windows Form 設計工具設定屬性，可以指定只有文字。If the property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. 常見用法屬性是用來儲存與控制項密切相關的資料。A common use for the property is to store data that is closely associated with the control. 例如，如果您有顯示客戶的相關資訊的控制項，您可能會儲存，其中包含在該控制項中的客戶的訂單記錄屬性，因此可快速存取資料。For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a that contains the customer's order history in that control's property so the data can be accessed quickly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示表單，並將`Customer`在其屬性。The following code example displays a form and stores a `Customer` in its property. 這個範例需要您已定義的類別，衍生自名為`CustomerForm`和您定義`Customer`。This example requires that you have defined a class that derives from named `CustomerForm` and that you have defined a `Customer`. summary.span: 取得或設定這個控制項的相關文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.

value.span: 與這個控制項關聯的文字。

span.span: The text associated with this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的屬性在每個衍生類別中有不同的使用方式。The property of the control is used differently by each derived class. 比方說屬性會顯示在表單頂端的標題列中，是相當小的字元數，通常會顯示應用程式或文件的名稱。For example the property of a is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name. 不過，屬性可能很大，而且可以包含多個非視覺化的字元，用來格式化文字。However, the property of a can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text. 例如，將中顯示的文字可以藉由調整格式化屬性，或加上空格或定位點字元對齊的文字。For example, the text displayed in a can be formatted by adjusting the properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此範例會建立，並設定其群組方塊內。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下來，它會設定屬性群組 方塊中，並群組方塊的停駐在表單頂端。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最後，它會停用 [群組] 中設定屬性設`false`，因而導致停用群組內包含的所有控制項。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使控制項重繪其工作區內的失效區域。

span.span: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行繪製的任何暫止要求。Executes any pending requests for painting. 有兩種方式可以重新繪製的表單和其內容：There are two ways to repaint a form and its contents: - 您可以使用其中一個多載方法使用方法。You can use one of the overloads of the method with the method. - 您可以呼叫方法，它會強制控制項重繪本身及其所有子系。You can call the method, which forces the control to redraw itself and all its children. 這相當於設定方法，以`true`，並使用它與。This is equivalent to setting the method to `true` and using it with . 方法控管功能取得繪製，或重新繪製。The method governs what gets painted or repainted. 繪製或 repainting 發生時，會控管方法。The method governs when the painting or repainting occurs. 如果您使用並放在一起，而不是呼叫方法，取得重新繪製項目取決於哪一個多載您使用。If you use the and methods together rather than calling , what gets repainted depends on which overload of you use. 方法只會強制立即執行，繪製控制項，但方法會控管功能取得繪製呼叫時方法。The method just forces the control to be painted immediately, but the method governs what gets painted when you call the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WM_PAINT](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_PAINT](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當您執行的作業採用可觀的時間，請使用等待游標。Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time. 不過請注意，封鎖 UI 執行緒的作業也會封鎖資料指標變更。However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block a cursor change. 因此，在另一個執行緒中執行耗時的作業時，應該只使用這個屬性。Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread. 若要變更資料指標全域和立即，請參閱屬性。To change the cursor globally and immediately, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），藉由呼叫變更焦點或方法，或藉由設定屬性到目前表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`，則和會隱藏事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果的屬性設為`true`中事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件會隱藏事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設定內在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題中和 「 訊息死結 」 一節[有關訊息和訊息佇列](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the [About Messages and Message Queues](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別並驗證使用者輸入電子郵件地址。The following code example uses the derived class and validates an email address that the user enters. 如果電子郵件地址不是標準格式 (包含 「@" and "。")，驗證失敗，圖示顯示，並且取消事件。If the email address is not in the standard format (containing "@" and "."), the validation fails, an icon is displayed, and the event is canceled. 這個範例需要和控制項在表單上建立。This example requires that a and control have been created on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件屬性會變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會引發事件時屬性值為控制項已變更。The following code example raises the event when the property value of the control has changed. [!code-cpp[Control_VisibleChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_VisibleChanged/CPP/control_visiblechanged.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control_VisibleChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_VisibleChanged/CS/control_visiblechanged.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_VisibleChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_VisibleChanged/VB/control_visiblechanged.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the control.

value.span: 控制項的寬度 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The width of the control in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所做的變更並屬性值會使變更控制項的屬性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立三個表單上的控制項，並使用不同的大小以及位置相關屬性會設定它們的大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此範例中，您需要具有寬度和高度的最少 300 像素。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有訊息都會都傳送至方法之後取得透過篩選方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc\` 函式。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 如需有關處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WindowProc 函式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565)。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別結構。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. [WM_ACTIVATEAPP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)作業系統訊息會在此範例中了解當另一個應用程式成為使用中處理。The [WM_ACTIVATEAPP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx) operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 請參閱下列主題，以了解可用， ，和值。See the following topics to understand the available , , and values. 實際的常數值可以找到在 Windows.h 標頭檔。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]
